duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensuring the highest quality of culinary services for Members and Guests.
Supporting a la carte and private event food production while maintaining consistent food preparation and plate presentation.
Assisting the Executive Chef and Sous Chef with requested tasks and working at an efficient pace to keep up with business needs.
Setting up and stocking food items and other necessary supplies.
Maintaining cleanliness and complying with food sanitation requirements by properly handling food and ensuring correct storage.
Performing inventory checks and completing food storage logs.
